attributes.action: wear an England shirt at the Rugby World Cup Final on Saturday night.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Prime Minster Brown is making a special trip to the World Cup Final on Saturday night, he should back England all the way and wear the shirt of England. If not, maybe he would like to donate his ticket to a proud English fan.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
